name: Lucky Delivery
description:
Enjoy this action game where boxes fall everywhere! The project was made for the 22nd edition of the ScoreSpace Jam.

All feedback is welcome, you can use the rating system or the comment section to help me improve my future games


Known issues

These are the bugs that I plan on fixing after the jam ends:

  1. Pause menu fix
  2. Leaderboard not updating (if you clear the cookies it works)
  3. Removing transition skipping
  4. Fixing timing when a song ends
  5. Balancing a bit the game
  6. Fixing some sprites
Controls Game:
  • [W A S D]
  • [Click] to shoot
  • [Space] Dash
  • [P] Pause, currently bugged
  • [Z] When paused to go the main menu
Menus:
  • [Arrows] to select
  • [Enter] to confirm
  • [Z] to go back
Credits

Art and programming by @ItsAssasin

Original Soundtrack by @Ciper91
